CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(FNS_SLAStatus__c , 'YELLOW') , IMAGE("/resource/FNS_OrangeStatus","YELLOW", 15, 75) , IF( ISPICKVAL(FNS_SLAStatus__c , 'GREEN') , IMAGE("/resource/FNS_GreenStatus","GREEN", 15, 75), IF( ISPICKVAL(FNS_SLAStatus__c , 'RED') , IMAGE("/resource/FNS_RedStatus", "RED", 15, 75), NULL )))
CustomField.label: SLA
